verses.name: Romans 3:19
verses.text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith, it saith to them who are under the law: that every mouth may be stopped, and all the world may become guilty before God.

verses.name: Romans 3:20
verses.text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.

verses.name: Romans 3:21
verses.text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets;
